text: Edward Anthony Mechling (January 31, 1878 - March 5, 1938) was an American track and field athlete who competed at the 1900 Summer Olympics in Paris, France. Mechling competed in the 800 metres. He placed fourth or fifth in his first-round (semifinals) heat and did not advance to the final. ==References== * De Wael, Herman. Herman's Full Olympians: "Athletics 1900". Accessed 18 March 2006. title: Edward Mechling
